name: @moduler-prompt/root
description: Modular prompt framework for generative AI

scripts.build: npm run build -w @moduler-prompt/core && npm run build -w @moduler-prompt/utils && npm run build -w @moduler-prompt/driver && npm run build -w @moduler-prompt/process && npm run build -w @moduler-prompt/simple-chat
scripts.test: npm test -w @moduler-prompt/core && npm test -w @moduler-prompt/utils && npm test -w @moduler-prompt/driver && npm test -w @moduler-prompt/process && npm test -w @moduler-prompt/simple-chat
scripts.clean:all: npm run clean --workspaces && rm -rf node_modules packages/*/node_modules
scripts.lint: npm run lint -w @moduler-prompt/core && npm run lint -w @moduler-prompt/utils && npm run lint -w @moduler-prompt/driver && npm run lint -w @moduler-prompt/process && npm run lint -w @moduler-prompt/simple-chat
scripts.mlx:test: cd packages/driver/src/mlx-ml/python && uv run python test_api_spec.py
scripts.postinstall: npm run mlx:setup || echo 'MLX setup failed, you can run it manually with: npm run mlx:setup'
